alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued October 22 at 8:20PM MDT until October 23 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 16 expected. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Sunday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Sanpete Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
